metadata.title: Complete Taittiriya Corpus
metadata.description: Complete digitized texts of Taittiriya Samhita, Brahmana, and Aranyaka

samhita.description: Mantra texts with padam (word-by-word) and samhita (continuous) versions

aranyaka.description: Forest texts with philosophical and mystical content

suqvIrA$H praqjAH pra#jaqnayaqn parI#hi | SuqkraH SuqkraSO#ciShA || stuqtO#&siq jana#dhAH | dEqvAstvA# manthiqpAH praNa#yantu || suqpraqjAH praqjAH pra#jaqnayaqn parI#hi | maqnthI maqnthiSO#ciShA || saqjaMqgmAqnau diqva A pRu#thiqvyA&&yu#H | saMdha#ttaqM tanmE# jinvatam | prAqNa(gm) saMdha#ttaqM taM mE# jinvatam | aqpAqna(gm) saMdha#ttaqM taM mE# jinvatam | 2 (10)

vyAqna(gm) saMdha#ttaqM taM mE# jinvatam | cakShuqH saMdha#ttaqM tanmE# jinvatam | SrOtraq(gm)q saMdha#ttaqM tanmE# jinvatam | manaqH saMdha#ttaqM tanmE# jinvatam | vAcaq(gm)q saMdha#ttaqM tAM mE# jinvatam || Ayu#H sthaq Ayu#rmE dhattam | Ayu#r yaqj~jAya# dhattam | Ayu#r yaqj~japa#tayE dhattam | prAqNaH stha#H prAqNaM mE# dhattam | prAqNaM ~Myaqj~jAya# dhattam | 3 (10)

prAqNaM ~Myaqj~japa#tayE dhattam | cakShu#H sthaqScakShu#rmE dhattam | cakShu#r yaqj~jAya# dhattam | cakShu#r yaqj~japa#tayE dhattam | SrOtra(gg)# sthaqH SrOtra#M mE dhattam | SrOtra#M ~Myaqj~jAya# dhattam | SrOtra#M ~Myaqj~japa#tayE dhattam | tau dE#vau SukrAmanthinau | kaqlpaya#taqM daivIqrviSa#H | kaqlpaya#taqM mAnu#ShIH | 4 (10)

iShaq-mUrja#maqsmAsu# dhattam | prAqNAn paqSuShu# | praqjAM mayi# caq yaja#mAnE ca || nira#staqH SaNDa#H | nira#stOq marka#H || apa#nuttauq SaNDAqmarkau# saqhAmunA$ || Suqkrasya# saqmida#si | maqnthina#H saqmida#si || sa pra#thaqmaH saMkRu#tir viqSvaka#rmA | sa pra#thaqmO miqtrO varu#NO aqgniH ( ) | sa pra#thaqmO bRuhaqspati#ScikiqtvAn | tasmAq indrA#ya suqtamAju#hOmi || 5 (12) (naqyaq - ntvaqpAqna(gm) saMdha#ttaMq taM mE# jinvataM - prAqNaM ~Myaqj~jAya# dhattaMq - mAnu#ShIr - aqgnir dvE ca#) (A1) (SpEcial kOrvai fOr Anuvakam 1 ) brahma# kShaqtraM tat | iShaqmUrja(gm)# raqyiM puShTi#M praqjAM tAm | paqSun tAn | sandha#ttaqM tat | prAqNama#pAqnaM ~MvyAqnaM tam | cakShuqH SrOtraqM manaqstat | vAcaqM tAm | iqShAdiqpa~jca#kEq vAcaqM tAM mE$ | paqSUn thsaMdha#ttaqM tAnmE$ | prAqNAdiqtrita#yEq taM mE$ | aqnyatraq tanmE$ | ) 1.1.2 anuvAkaM 2 - athAgnyAdhAnaprakaraNaM, tatra kAlaviSEShavidhiH

kRutti#kA-svaqgni-mAda#dhIta | EqtadvA aqgnEr nakSha#tram | yat kRutti#kAH | svAyA#mEqvaina#M dEqvatA#yAmAqdhAya# | braqhmaqvaqrcaqsI Ba#vati || muKaqM ~MvA EqtannakSha#trANAm | yat kRutti#kAH | yaH kRutti#kA-svaqgni-mA#dhaqttE | muKya# Eqva Ba#vati || athOq Kalu# | 6 (10)

aqgniq-naqkShaqtramitya-pa#cAyanti | gRuqhAn.haq dAhu#kO Bavati || praqjApa#tI rOhiqNyA-maqgni-ma#sRujata | taM dEqvA rO#hiqNyA-mAda#dhata | tatOq vai tE sarvAqn rOhA#narOhann | tad-rO#hiqNyai rO#hiNiqtvam | yO rO#hiqNyA-maqgnimA#dhaqttE | RuqdhnOtyEqva | sarvAqn rOhA$n-rOhati || dEqvA vai BaqdrAH santOq&gni-mAdhi#thsanta | 7 (10)

tEShAqmanA#hitOq &gnirAsI$t | athai$ByO vAqmaM ~MvasvapA$krAmat | tE puna#rvasvOqrAda#dhata | tatOq vai tAn vAqmaM ~MvasUqpAva#rtata | yaH puqrA BaqdraH saMpApI#yAqn thsyAt | sa puna#rvasvO-raqgni-mAda#dhIta | puna#rEqvaina#M ~MvAqmaM ~MvasUqpAva#rtatE | BaqdrO Ba#vati || yaH kAqmayE#taq dAna#kAmA mE praqjAH syuqriti# | sa pUrva#yOqH Palgu#nyO-raqgni-mAda#dhIta | 8 (10)

aqryaqmNO vA EqtannakSha#tram | yatpUrvEq Palgu#nI | aqryaqmEtiq tamA#huqryO dadA#ti | dAna#kAmA asmai praqjA Ba#vanti || yaH kAqmayE#ta BaqgI syAqmiti# | sa utta#rayOqH Palgu#nyO-raqgnimAda#dhIta | Baga#syaq vA EqtannakSha#tram | yadutta#rEq Palgu#nI | BaqgyE#va Ba#vati || kAqlaqkaq~jjA vai nAmAsu#rA Asann | 9 (10)

tE su#vaqrgAya# lOqkAyAqgni-ma#cinvata | puru#Shaq iShTa#kAq-mupA#dadhAqt-puru#Shaq iShTa#kAm | sa indrO$ brAhmaqNO bruvA#Naq iShTa#kAqmupA#dhatta | EqShA mE# ciqtrA nAmEti# | tE su#vaqrgaM ~MlOqkamAprArO#hann | sa indraq iShTa#kAqmAvRu#hat | tE&vA#kIryanta | yE#&vAkI$ryanta | ta UrNAqvaBa#yO&Bavann | dvAvuda#patatAm | 10 (10)

tau diqvyau SvAnA#vaBavatAm | yO BrAtRu#vyavAqn thsyAt | sa ciqtrAyA#-maqgni-mAda#dhIta | aqvaqkIryaiqva BrAtRu#vyAn | OjOq bala#mindriqyaM ~MvIqrya#mAqtman-dha#ttE || vaqsantA$ brAhmaqNO$ &gnimAda#dhIta | vaqsaqntO vai brA$hmaqNasyaqrtuH | sva Eqvaina#-mRuqtAvAqdhAya# | braqhmaqvaqrcaqsI Ba#vati | muKaqM ~MvA EqtadRu#tUqnAm | 11 (10)

yad-va#saqntaH | yO vaqsantAq&gnimA#dhaqttE | muKya# Eqva Ba#vati | athOq yOni#mantamEqvainaqM prajA#taqmAdha#ttE | grIqShmE rA#jaqnya# Ada#dhIta | grIqShmO vai rA#jaqnya#syaqrtuH | sva Eqvaina#mRuqtAvAqdhAya# | iqndriqyAqvI Ba#vati | Saqradiq vaiSyaq Ada#dhIta | Saqradvai vaiSya#syaqrtuH | 12 (10)

sva Eqvaina#mRuqtAvAqdhAya# | paqSuqmAn Ba#vati || na pUrva#yOqH Palgu#nyO-raqgnimAda#dhIta | EqShA vai ja#GaqnyA# rAtri#H saM~Mvathsaqrasya# | yatpUrvEq Palgu#nI | pRuqShTiqta Eqva sa#M~MvathsaqrasyAq-gnimAqdhAya# | pApI#yAn-Bavati | utta#rayOqrAda#dhIta | EqShA vai pra#thaqmA rAtri#H saM~Mvathsaqrasya# | yadutta#rEq Palgu#nI ( ) | muqKaqta Eqva sa#M~MvathsaqrasyAq-gnimAqdhAya# | vasI#yAn Bavati || athOq Kalu# | yaqdaivaina#M ~Myaqj~ja u#paqnamE$t | athAda#dhIta | saivAsyarddhi#H || 13 (16) 1.1.3 anuvAkaM 3 - dEvayajanArthAH saMBArAH

uddha#nti | yadEqvAsyA# amEqddhyam | tadapa# hanti || aqpO&vO$kShatiq SAntyai$ || sika#tAq niva#pati | EqtadvA aqgnEr vai$SvAnaqrasya# rUqpam | rUqpENaiqva vai$SvAnaqramava#-rundhE || UShAqn niva#pati | puShTiqrvA EqShA praqjana#nam | yadUShA$H | 14 (10)

puShTyA#mEqva praqjana#nEq &gnimAdha#ttE | athO# saMqj~jAna# Eqva | saqM j~jAnaq(gg)q hyE#tat pa#SUqnAm | yadUShA$H || dyAvA#pRuthiqvI saqhAstA$m | tE vi#yaqtI a#brUtAm | astvEqva nau# saqha yaqj~jiyaqmiti# | yadaqmuShyA# yaqj~jiyaqmAsI$t | tadaqsyA-ma#dadhAt | ta UShA# aBavann | 15 (10)

yadaqsyA yaqj~jiyaqmAsI$t | tadaqmuShyA#-madadhAt | tadaqdaScaqndrama#si kRuqShNam | UShA$nniqvapa#nnaqdO ddhyA#yEt | dyAvA#pRuthiqvyOrEqva yaqj~jiyEq-&gnimAdha#ttE || aqgnirdEqvEByOq nilA#yata | AqKU rUqpaM kRuqtvA | sa pRu#thiqvIM prAvi#Sat | sa UqtIH ku#rvAqNaH pRu#thiqvImanuq sama#carat | tadA#KukarIqSha-ma#Bavat | 16 (10)

yadA#KukarIqSha(gm) sa#BAMqrO Bava#ti | yadEqvAsyaq tatraq nya#ktam | tadEqvAva#rundhE || UrjaqM ~MvA Eqta(gm) rasa#M pRuthiqvyA u#paqdIkAq uddi#hanti | yad vaqlmIka$m | yad va#lmIkavaqpA sa#BAMqrO Bava#ti | Urja#mEqva rasa#M pRuthiqvyA ava#rundhE | athOq SrOtra#mEqva | SrOtraq(gg)q hyE#tat pRu#thiqvyAH | yad vaqlmIka#H || 17 (10)

aba#dhirO Bavati | ya EqvaM ~MvEda# || praqjApa#tiH praqjA a#sRujata | tAsAqmannaq-mupA$kShIyata | tAByaqH sUdaqmupaq prABi#nat | tatOq vai tAsAqmannaqM nAkShI#yata | yasyaq sUda#H saMBAqrO Bava#ti | nAsya# gRuqhE&nna#M kShIyatE || ApOq vA iqdamagrE# saliqlamA#sIt | tEna# praqjApa#tiraSrAmyat | 18 (10)

kaqthamiqda(gg) syAqditi# | sO#&paSyat puShkarapaqrNaM tiShTha#t | sO#&manyata | astiq vai tat | yasmi#n-niqdamadhiq tiShThaqtIti# | sa va#rAqhO rUqpaM kRuqtvOpaqnya#majjat | sa pRu#thiqvImaqdha A$rcCat | tasyA# upaqhatyOda#majjat | tat pu#ShkarapaqrNE$ &prathayat | yadapra#thayat | 19 (10)

tat pRu#thiqvyai pRu#thiviqtvam | aBUqdvA iqdamiti# | tadBUmyai# BUmiqtvam | tAM diSO&nuq vAtaqH sama#vahat | tA(gm) Sarka#rABiradRu(gm) hat | SaM ~Mvai nO#&BUqditi# | tacCarka#rANA(gm) Sarkaraqtvam | yad-va#rAqhavi#hata(gm) saMBAqrO Bava#ti | aqsyAmEqvA-Ca#mbaTkAramaqgni-mAdha#ttE | Sarka#rA Bavantiq dhRutyai$ | 20 (10)

athO# SaqtvAMya# || sarE#tA aqgnirAqdhEyaq ityA#huH | ApOq varu#Nasyaq patna#ya Asann | tA aqgniraqBya#ddhyAyat | tAH sama#Bavat | tasyaq rEtaqH parA#&patat | taddhira#Nya-maBavat | yaddhira#Nya-muqpAsya#ti | sarE#tasamEqvAgni-mAdha#ttE || puru#Shaq invai svAd-rEta#sO bIBathsataq ityA#huH | 21 (10)

uqttaqraqta upA$syaqtya-bI#BathsAyai || atiq praya#cCati | Arti#mEqvAtiq praya#cCati || aqgnirdEqvEByOq nilA#yata | aSvO# rUqpaM kRuqtvA | sO$&SvaqtthE sa#M~Mvathsaqra-ma#tiShThat | tada#SvaqtthasyA$-Svatthaqtvam | yadASva#tthaH saMBAqrO Bava#ti | yadEqvAsyaq tatraq nya#ktam | tadEqvAva#-rundhE || 22 (10)

dEqvA vA UrjaqM ~Mvya#Bajanta | tata# uduqmbaraq uda#tiShThat | UrgvA u#duqmbara#H | yadaudu#mbaraH saMBAqrO Bava#ti | Urja#mEqvAva#-rundhE || tRuqtIya#syAmiqtO diqvi sOma# AsIt | taM gA#yaqtryAha#rat | tasya# paqrNama#cCidyata | tatpaqrNO# &Bavat | tat paqrNasya# parNaqtvam | 23 (10)

yasya# parNaqmaya#H saMBAqrO Bava#ti | sOqmaqpIqthamEqvAva# rundhE || dEqvA vai brahma#nnavadanta | tat paqrNa upA#SRuNOt | suqSravAq vai nAma# | yat pa#rNaqmaya#H saMBAqrO Bava#ti | braqhmaqvaqrcaqsamEqvAva# rundhE || praqjApa#ti-raqgni-ma#sRujata | sO#&biBEqtpra mA# dhakShyaqtIti# | ta(gm) SaqmyA#&Samayat | 24 (10)

tacCaqmyai# Samiqtvam | yacCa#mIqmaya#H saMBAqrO Bava#ti | SAntyAq apra#dAhAya || aqgnEH sRuqShTasya# yaqtaH | vika#~gkataqM BA A$rcCat | yad-vaika#~gkataH saMBAqrO Bava#ti | BA EqvAva#rundhE || sahRu#dayOq &gnirAqdhEyaq ityA#huH | maqrutOq&dBiraqgni-ma#tamayann | tasya# tAqntasyaq hRuda#yaqmAcCi#ndann ( ) | sA&Sani#raBavat | yadaqSani#hatasya vRuqkShasya# saMBAqrO Bava#ti | sahRu#daya-mEqvAgni-mAdha#ttE || 25 (13) (UShA# - aBavan - naBavad - vaqlmIkrO$ - &SrAmyaq - dapra#thayaq - ddhRutyai# - bIBathsataq ityA#hu - rundhE - parNaqtva - ma#Samayada - cCindaq(gg)q strINi# ca) (A3) 1.1.4 anuvAkaM 4 - saMBArasaM~MyuktAyatanEShu agnyAdhAnam

dvAqdaqSasu# vikrAqmEShvaqgnimAda#dhIta | dvAda#Saq mAsA$H saM~MvathsaqraH | saqM~MvaqthsaqrA-dEqvaina#-mavaqruddhyA-dha#ttE || yad-dvA#daqSasu# vikrAqmE-ShvAqdadhI#ta | pari#mitaqmava#rundhIta | cakShu#r nimitaq Ada#dhIta | iyaqd-dvAda#Sa vikrAqmA(3) iti# | pari#mitaM caiqvApa#rimitaqM cAva#rundhE || anRu#taqM ~Mvai vAqcA va#dati | anRu#taqM mana#sA ddhyAyati | 26 (10)

cakShuqr vai saqtyam | adrA(3)gityA#ha | ada#r.Saqmiti# | tath saqtyam | yaScakShu#r-nimitEq&gni-mA#dhaqttE | saqtya Eqvainaq-mAdha#ttE || tasmAqdAhi#tAgniqrnAnRu#taM ~MvadEt | nAsya# brAhmaqNO&nA$SvAn gRuqhE va#sEt | saqtyE hya#syAqgnirAhi#taH || AqgnEqyI vai rAtri#H | 27 (10)

AqgnEqyAH paqSava#H | aiqndramaha#H | naktaqM gAr.ha#patyaq-mAda#dhAti | paqSUnEqvAva#-rundhE | divA#&&havaqnIya$m | iqndriqyamEqvA-va#rundhE || aqrddhOdi#tEq sUrya# AhavaqnIyaq-mAda#dhAti | Eqtasmiqn vai lOqkE praqjApa#tiH praqjA a#sRujata | praqjA Eqva tad-yaja#mAnaH sRujatE | athO# BUqtaM caiqva Ba#viqShyaccA-va#rundhE || 28 (10)

iDAq vai mA#naqvI ya#j~jAnUkAqSinyA#sIt | sA&SRu#NOt | asu#rA aqgnimAda#dhataq iti# | tada#gacCat | ta A#havaqnIyaqmagraq Ada#dhata | athaq gAr.ha#patyam | athA$-nvAhAryaq-paca#nam | sA &bra#vIt | praqtIcyE#ShAq(gg)q SrIra#gAt | BaqdrA BUqtvA parA#BaviShyaqntIti# | 29 (10)

yasyaiqva-maqgnirA#dhIqyatE$ | praqtIcya#syaq SrIrE#ti | BaqdrO BUqtvA parA#Bavati || sA&SRu#NOt | dEqvA aqgni-mAda#dhataq iti# | tada#gacCat | tE$&nvAhAryaq-paca#naqmagraq Ada#dhata | athaq gAr.ha#patyam | athA#havaqnIya$m | sA&bra#vIt | 30 (10)

prAcyE#ShAq(gg)q SrIra#gAt | BaqdrA BUqtvA su#vaqrgaM ~MlOqkamE$Shyanti | praqjAM tu na vE$thsyantaq iti# | yasyaiqvamaqgni-rA#dhIqyatE$ | prAcya#syaq SrIrE#ti | BaqdrO BUqtvA su#vaqrgaM ~MlOqkamE#ti | praqjAM tu na vi#ndatE || sA&bra#vIqdiDAq manu$m | tathAq vA aqhaM tavAqgni-mAdhA$syAmi | yathAq pra praqjayA# paqSuBi#r mithuqnair ja#niqShyasE$ | 31 (10)

pratyaqsmin ~MlOqkE sthAqsyasi# | aqBi su#vaqrgaM ~MlOqkaM jEqShyasIti# | gAr.ha#patyaqmagraq Ada#dhAt | gAr.ha#patyaqM ~MvA anu# praqjAH paqSavaqH prajA#yantE | gAr.ha#patyEnaiqvAsmai$ praqjAM paqSUn prAja#nayat | athA$-nvAhAryaq-paca#nam | tiqrya~g~g#vaq vA aqyaM ~MlOqkaH | aqsminnEqva tEna# lOqkE pratya#tiShThat | athA#havaqnIya$m | tEnaiqva su#vaqrgaM ~MlOqka-maqBya#jayat | 32 (10)

yasyaiqvamaqgni-rA#dhIqyatE$ | pra praqjayA# paqSuBi#r mithuqnair jA#yatE | pratyaqsmin ~MlOqkE ti#ShThati | aqBi su#vaqrgaM ~MlOqkaM ja#yati || yasyaq vA aya#thAdEvatamaqgni-rA#dhIqyatE$ | A dEqvatA$ByO vRuScyatE | pApI#yAn Bavati | yasya# yathA dEvaqtam | na dEqvatA$Byaq AvRu#ScyatE | vasI#yAn Bavati ( ) | 33 (10)

aqgnirna#H pAtuq kRutti#kAH | nakSha#traM dEqvami#ndriqyam | iqdamA#sAM ~MvicakShaqNam | haqvirAqsaM ju#hOtana || yasyaq BAnti# raqSmayOq yasya# kEqtava#H | yasyEqmA viSvAq Buva#nAniq sarvA$ | sa kRutti#kABiraqBi saqm~MvasA#naH | aqgnirnO# dEqvaH su#viqtE da#dhAtu || praqjApa#tE rOhiqNI vE#tuq patnI$ | viqSvarU#pA bRuhaqtI ciqtraBA#nuH | 1 (10)

sA nO# yaqj~jasya# suviqtE da#dhAtu | yathAq jIvE#ma SaqradaqH savI#rAH || rOqhiqNI dEqvyuda#gAt puqrastA$t | viSvA# rUqpANi# pratiqmOda#mAnA | praqjApa#ti(gm) haqviShA# vaqrddhaya#ntI | priqyA dEqvAnAq-mupa#yAtu yaqj~jam || sOmOq rAjA# mRugaSIqraq.ShENaq Agann# | SiqvaM nakSha#traM priqyama#syaq dhAma# | AqpyAya#mAnO bahuqqdhA janE#Shu | rEta#H praqjAM ~Myaja#mAnE dadhAtu || 2 (10)

yat tEq nakSha#traM mRugaSIqqraq.Shamasti# | priqya(gm) rA#jan priqyata#maM priqyANA$m | tasmai# tE sOma haqviShA# vidhEma | Sanna# Edhi dviqpadEq SaM catu#ShpadE || AqrdrayA# ruqdraH pratha#mAna Eti | SrEShThO# dEqvAnAqM pati#raGniqyAnA$m | nakSha#tramasya haqviShA# vidhEma | mA na#H praqjA(gm) rI#riShaqn mOta vIqrAn || hEqtI ruqdrasyaq pari#NO vRuNaktu | AqrdrA nakSha#traM juShatA(gm) haqvirna#H | 3 (10)

praqmuq~jcamA#nau duriqtAniq viSvA$ | apAqGaSa(gm)# saM nudatAqmarA#tim || puna#rnO dEqvyadi#tiH spRuNOtu | puna#rvasU naqH punaqrEtA$M ~Myaqj~jam | puna#rnO dEqvA aqBiya#ntuq sarvE$ | puna#H punarvO haqviShA# yajAmaH || EqvA na dEqvyadi#tiranaqrvA | viSva#sya BaqrtrI jaga#taH pratiqShThA | puna#rvasU haqviShA# vaqrddhaya#ntI | priqyaM dEqvAnAq-mapyE#tuq pAtha#H || 4 (10)

bRuhaqspati#H prathaqmaM jAya#mAnaH | tiqShya#M nakSha#tramaqBi saMba#BUva | SrEShThO# dEqvAnAqM pRuta#nAsu jiqShNuH | diSO&nuq sarvAq aBa#yannO astu || tiqShya#H puqrastA#duqta ma#ddhyaqtO na#H | bRuhaqspati# rnaqH pari#pAtu paqScAt | bAdhE#tAqn dvEShOq aBa#yaM kRuNutAm | suqvIrya#syaq pata#yaH syAma || iqda(gm) saqrpEByO# haqvira#stuq juShTa$m | AqSrEqShA yEShA#-manuqyantiq cEta#H | 5 (10)

yE aqntari#kShaM pRuthiqvIM kShiqyanti# | tEna#H saqrpAsOq havaqmAga#miShThAH || yE rO#caqnE sUryaqsyApi# saqrpAH | yE diva#M dEqvImanu# saq~jcara#nti | yEShA#mASrEqShA a#nuqyantiq kAma$m | tEBya#H saqrpEByOq madhu#majjuhOmi || upa#hUtAH piqtarOq yE maqGAsu# | manO#javasaH suqkRuta#H sukRuqtyAH | tE nOq nakSha#trEq havaqmAga#miShThAH | svaqdhABi# ryaqj~jaM praya#taM juShantAm || 6 (10)

yE a#gnidaqgdhA yE&na#gni-dagdhAH | yE#&muM ~MlOqkaM piqtara#H kShiqyanti# | yA(gg)Sca# viqdmayA(gm) u# caq na pra#viqdma | maqGAsu# yaqj~ja(gm) sukRu#taM juShantAm || gavAqM patiqH Palgu#nInAmasiq tvam | tada#ryaman varuNa mitraq cAru# | taM tvA# vaqya(gm) sa#niqtAra(gm)# sanIqnAm | jIqvA jIva#ntaqmupaq sam~Mvi#SEma || yEnEqmA viSvAq Buva#nAniq sa~jji#tA | yasya# dEqvA a#nu saqm~Myantiq cEta#H | 7 (10)

iqmama#gnE camaqsam mA vijI$hvaraH priqyO dEqvAnA#muqta sOqmyAnA$m | EqSha yaSca#maqsO dE#vaqpAnaqstasmi#n dEqvA aqmRutA# mAdayantAm || aqgnErvarmaq pariq gOBi#rvyayasvaq saMprOrNu#Shvaq mEda#sAq pIva#sA ca | nEttvA# dhRuqShNur. hara#sAq jar.hRu#ShANOq dadha#d-vidhaqkShyan-paryaq~gKayA#tai || maina#magnEq vida#hOq mA&BiSO#cOq mA&syaq tvaca#m cikShipOq mA SarI#ram | yaqdA SRuqtam kaqravO# jAtavEqdO&thE#mEnaqm prahi#NutAt piqtRuBya#H || SRuqtam ~MyaqdA kaqrasi# jAtavEqdO&thE#mEnaqm pari#dattAt piqtRuBya#H | yaqdA gacCAqtyasu#nItimEqtAmathA# dEqvAnA$m ~MvaSaqnIrBa#vAti || sUrya#m tEq cakShu#r-gacCatuq vAta#mAqtmA dyAm caq gacCa# pRuthiqvIm caq dharma#NA | aqpO vA# gacCaq yadiq tatra# tE hiqtamOSha#dhIShuq prati#tiShThAq SarI#raiH ( ) || aqjO BAqgastapa#sAq tam ta#pasvaq tam tE# SOqcista#patuq tam tE# aqrciH | yAstE# SiqvAstaqnuvO# jAtavEdaqstABi#r-vahEqma(gm) suqkRutAqm ~Myatra# lOqkAH || aqyam ~Mvai tvamaqsmAdadhiq tvamEqtadaqyam ~Mvai tada#syaq yOni#rasi | vaiqSvAqnaqraH puqtraH piqtrE lO#kaqkRu-jjA#tavEdOq vahE#ma(gm) suqkRutAqm ~Myatra# lOqkAH || 4 (14)

uqruqNaqsA-va#suqtRupA#-vulumbaqlau yaqmasya# dUqtau ca#ratOq vaSAq(gm)q anu# | tAvaqsmaBya#m dRuqSayEq sUryA#yaq puna#rdat tAqvasu#maqdyEha Baqdram || sOmaq EkE$ByaH pavatE GRuqtamEkaq upA#satE | yEByOq madhu# praqdhAva#tiq tA(gg)-Sci#dEqvApi#gacCatAt || yE yuddhya#ntE praqdhanE#Shuq SUrA#sOq yE ta#nuqtyaja#H | yE vA# saqhasra#dakShiNAqstA(gg) Sci#dEqvApi#gacCatAt || tapa#sAq yE a#nAdhRuqShyA-stapa#sAq yE suva#rgaqtAH | tapOq yE ca#kriqrE maqhat tA(gg)-Sci#dEqvApi#gacCatAt || aSma#nvatI rEvatIqH sa(gm)ra#Baddhvaq-mutti#ShThataq prata#ratA saKAyaH | atrA# jahAmaq yE asaqnnaSE#vAH SiqvAn. vaqyamaqBi vAjAqnutta#rEma || 7 (10)

annAqdvai praqjAH praqjAya#ntE | yAH kASca# pRuthiqvI(gg) SriqtAH | athOq annE#naiqva jI#vanti | athai#naqdapi#yantyantaqtaH | annaq(gm)q hi BUqtAnAqM jyEShTha$M | tasmA$th sarvauShaqdha mu#cyatE | sarvaqM ~Mvai tE&nna#mApnuvanti | yE&nnaqM brahmOqpAsa#tE | annaq(gm)q hi BUqtAnAqM jyEShTha$M | tasmA$th sarvauShaqdha mu#cyatE | annA$d BUqtAniq jAya#ntE | jAtAqnyannE#na varddhantE | adyatE&tti ca# BUtAqni | tasmAdannaM taducya#ta iqti || tasmAdvA EtasmA-danna#rasaqmayAt | anyO&ntara AtmA$ prANaq mayaH | tEnai#Sha pUqrNaH || sa vA ESha puruShavi#dha Eqva | tasya puru#Sha viqdhatAM | anvaya#M puruShaq vidhaH | tasya prANa# Evaq SiraH || vyAnO dakShi#NaH paqkShaH | apAna utta#raH paqkShaH | AkA#Sa AqtmA | pRuthivI pucCa#M pratiqShThA || tadapyESha SlO#kO Baqvati || 27 (26)

asaqdvA iqdamagra# AsIt | tatOq vai sada#jAyata | tadAtmAna(gg) svaya#-makuqruta | tasmAt tath sukRutamucya#ta iqti || yadvai# tath suqkRutaM | ra#sO vaiq saH | rasa(gg) hyEvAyaM ~MlabdhvA&&na#ndI Baqvati || kO hyEvAnyA$t kaH prAqNyAt | yadESha AkASa Ana#ndO naq syAt | ESha hyEvAna#ndayAqti || yaqdA hyE#vaiShaq Etasmin-nadRuSyE &nAtmyE &niruktE &nilayanE &BayaM prati#ShThAM ~MviqndatE | atha sO&BayaM ga#tO Baqvati || yaqdA hyE#vaiShaq Etasmin-nudara-manta#raM kuqrutE | atha tasya Ba#yaM Baqvati || tattvEva BayaM ~MviduShO-&ma#nvAnaqsya || tadapyESha SlO#kO Baqvati || 32 (16)

BIqShA&smAq-dvAta#H pavatE | BIqShOdE#tiq sUrya#H | BIShA&smA-dagni#-ScEndraqSca | mRutyur dhAvati pa~jca#ma iqti || saiShA&&nandasya mImA(gm)#sA Baqvati || yuvA syAth sAdhu yu#vA&ddhyAqyakaH | ASiShThO dRuDhiShThO# baliqShThaH | tasyEyaM pRuthivI sarvA vittasya# pUrNAq syAt | sa EkO mAnuSha# AnaqndaH || tE yE SataM mAnuShA# AnaqndAH | 33.a (10) sa EkO manuShya-gandharvANA#-mAnaqndaH | SrOtriyasya cAkAma#hataqsya || tE yE SataM manuShya-gandharvANA#-mAnaqndAH | sa EkO dEva-gandharvANA#-mAnaqndaH | SrOtriyasya cAkAma#hataqsya || tE yE SataM dEva-gandharvANA#-mAnaqndAH | sa EkaH pitRuNAM ciralOka-lOkAnA#-mAnaqndaH | SrOtriyasya cAkAma#hataqsya || tE yE SataM pitRuNAM ciralOka-lOkAnA#-mAnaqndAH | sa Eka AjAnajAnAM dEvAnA#-mAnaqndaH | 33.b (10) SrOtriyasya cAkAma#hataqsya || tE yE Sata-mAjAna-jAnAM dEvAnA# mAnaqndAH | sa EkaH karma-dEvAnAM dEvAnA#-mAnaqndaH | yE karmaNA dEvAna#pi yaqnti | SrOtriyasya cAkAma#hataqsya || tE yE SataM karmadEvAnAM dEvAnA#-mAnaqndAH | sa EkO dEvAnA#-mAnaqndaH | SrOtriyasya cAkAma#hataqsya || tE yE SataM dEvAnA#-mAnaqndAH | sa Eka indra#syAnaqndaH | 33.c (10) SrOtriyasya cAkAma#hataqsya || tE yE Satamindra#-syA&&naqndAH | sa EkO bRuhaspatE#-rAnaqndaH | SrOtriyasya cAkAma#hataqsya || tE yE SataM bRuhaspatE# rAnaqndAH | sa EkaH prajApatE#-rAnaqndaH | SrOtriyasya cAkAma#hataqsya || tE yE SataM prajApatE#-rAnaqndAH | sa EkO brahmaNa# AnaqndaH | SrOtriyasya cAkAma#hataqsya || 33.d (10) sa yaScA#yaM puqruShE | yaScAsA#-vAdiqtyE | sa Eka#H || sa ya# EvaqM ~Mvit | asmAllO#kAt prEqtya | Etamannamaya-mAtmAna-mupa#sa~gkrAqmati | EtaM prANamaya-mAtmAna-mupa#sa~gkrAqmati | EtaM manOmaya-mAtmAna-mupa#sa~gkrAqmati | EtaM ~Mvij~jAnamaya-mAtmAna-mupa#sa~gkrAqmati | EtamAnandamaya-mAtmAna-mupa#sa~gkrAqmati || tadapyESha SlO#kO Baqvati || 33.E (11)

yatOq vAcOq niva#rtantE | aprA$pyaq mana#sA saqha | AnandaM brahma#NO viqdvAn | na biBEti kuta#ScanEqti || Eta(gm) ha vA va# na taqpati | kimaha(gm) sAdhu# nAkaqravaM | kimahaM pApa-makara#va-miqti || sa ya EvaM ~MvidvAnEtE AtmA#na(gg) spRuqNutE || uqBE hyE#vaiShaq EtE AtmA#na(gg) spRuqNutE | ya EqvaM ~MvEda# || ityu#paqniSha#t || 34 (11) saqha nA# vavatu | saqha nau# Bunaktu | saqha vIqrya#M karavAvahai | tEqjaqsvinAq vadhI#tamastuq mA vi#dviShAqvahai$ || OM SAntiqH SAntiqH SAnti#H || (braqhmaqvididamayamidamEka#vi(gm)SatiH | annAq danna#rasaqmayAt prANOq vyAnO&pAna AkA#SaqH pRuthivI pucCaq(gm)q ShaDvi(gm)#SatiH | prAqNam prA#NaqmayAn ma#nOq yajuqr.q RuK sAmAdEqSO&tharvA~ggirasaH pucCaqm dvAvi(gm)#SatiH | yata#H Sraqddharta(gm) satyam ~MyO#gOq mahO#&ShTAda#Sa | viqj~jAnaqm priyaqm mOdaH pramOda Ana#ndOq brahma pucCaqm dvAvi(gm)#SatiH | asa#nnEqvAthAShTAvi (gm)#SatiH | asaqth ShODa#Sa | BIqShA&smAqn mAnuShOq manuShyagandharvANAqm dEvagandharvANAqm pitRuNAmciralOkalOkAnAq mAjAnajAnAm karmadEvAnAm ~MyE karmaNA dEvAnAqmindra#syaq bRuhaspatEqH prajApatEqr brahmaNaqH sa yaSva# saMkrAqmatyEka#pa~jcAqSat | yataqH kuta#Scaq naitamEkA#daSaq nava#) (A14) iti brahmAnandavallI samAptA ==================== OM namaH paramAtmanE, SrI mahAgaNapatayE namaH SrI guruByO namaH, haqriqH OM BRugu vallI saqha nA# vavatu | saqha nau# Bunaktu | saqha vIqrya#M karavAvahai | tEqjaqsvinAq vadhI#tamastuq mA vi#dviShAqvahai$ || OM SAntiqH SAntiqH SAnti#H || anuvAkaM - 15

BRuguqrvai vA#ruqNiH | varu#NaqM pita#raq-mupa#sasAra | adhI#hi BagavOq brahmEti# || tasmA# Eqtat prO#vAca | anna#M prAqNaM cakShuqH SrOtraqM manOq vAcaqmiti# || ta(gm) hO#vAca | yatOq vA iqmAniq BUtA#niq jAya#ntE | yEnaq jAtA#niq jIva#nti | yat praya#ntyaqBi sam~Mvi#Santi | tad viji#j~jAsasva | tad brahmEti# || sa tapO#&tapyata | sa tapa#-staqptvA || 35 (13)

AqnaqndO braqhmEtiq vya#jAnAt | AqnandAq-ddhyE#va-KalviqmAniq BUtA#niq jAya#ntE | AqnaqndEnaq jAtA#niq jIva#nti | AqnaqndaM praya#ntyaqBi-sam~Mvi#SaqntIti# || saiShA BA$rgaqvI vA#ruqNI viqdyA | paqraqmE vyO#maqn prati#ShThitA || ya EqvaM ~MvEdaq prati#tiShThati | anna#vAnannAqdO Ba#vati | maqhAn Ba#vati praqjayA# paqSuBi#r brahmavarcaqsEna# | maqhAn kIqrtyA || 40 (10)

aMBa#sya pAqrE Buva#nasyaq maddhyEq nAka#sya pRuqShThE ma#haqtO mahI#yAn | SuqkrENaq jyOtI(gm)#Shi samanuqpravi#ShTaH praqjApa#tiScaratiq garBE# aqntaH || yasmi#nniqda(gm) sa~jcaq vicaitiq sarvaqM ~Myasmi#n dEqvA adhiq viSvE# niShEqduH | tadEqva BUqqtaM taduq Bavya#mA iqdaM tadaqkSharE# paraqmE vyO#mann || yEnA# vRuqtaM Ka~jcaq diva#M maqhI~jcaq yEnA#diqtya-stapa#tiq tEja#sAq BrAja#sA ca | yamaqntaH sa#muqdrE kaqvayOq vaya#ntiq yadaqkSharE# paraqmE praqjAH || yata#H prasUqtA jaqgata#H prasUtIq tOyE#na jIqvAn vyaca#sarjaq (vyasa#sarjaq) BUmyA$M | yadOSha#dhIBiH puqruShA$n paqSU(gg)Scaq vivE#Sa BUqtAni# carAcaqrANi# || ata#H paraqM nAnyaq-daNI#yasahiq parA$t paraqM ~Myan maha#tO maqhAnta$M | yadE#ka-maqvyaktaq-mana#ntarUpaqM ~MviSva#M purAqNaM tama#saqH para#stAt || 1 (10)

tadEqvarttaM tadu# saqtyamA#huq-stadEqva brahma# paraqmaM ka#vIqnAM | iqShTAqpUqrttaM ba#huqdhA jAqtaM jAya#mAnaM ~MviqSvaM bi#Barttiq Buva#nasyaq nABi#H || tadEqvAgni-stadvAqyu-stathsUryaqstadu# caqndramA$H | tadEqva SuqkramaqmRutaqM tadbrahmaq tadApaqH sa praqjApa#tiH || sarvE# nimEqShA jaqj~jirE# viqdyutaqH puru#ShAqdadhi# | kaqlA mu#hUqrttAH kAShThA$ScAhO-rAqtrASca# sarvaqSaH || aqrddhaqmAqsA mAsA# Ruqtava#H sam~MvathsaqraSca# kalpantAM | sa Apa#H praduqGE uqBE iqmE aqntari#kShaq-mathOq suva#H || naina#-mUqrddhvaM na tiqryaM caq na maddhyEq pari#jagraBat | na tasyE#SEq kaScaqna tasya# nAma maqhadyaSa#H || 2 (10)
na saqdRuMSE# tiShThatiq rUpa#masyaq na cakShu#ShA paSyatiq kaScaqnaina$M | hRuqdA ma#nIqShA mana#sAq&Bi klRu#ptOq ya E#naM ~Mviqdu-ramRu#tAqstE Ba#vanti ||

Expansion of aqdByaH saMBU#taH (Appearing in T.A.3.13.1) aqdByaH saMBU#taH pRuthiqvyai rasA$cca | viqSvaka#rmaNaqH sama#varttaqtAdhi# | tasyaq tvaShTA# viqdadha#drUqpamE#ti || tatpuru#Shasyaq viSvaqmAjA#naqmagrE$ | vEdAqhamEqtaM puru#ShaM maqhAnta$M | Aqdiqtya va#rNaqM tama#saqH para#stAt | tamEqvaM ~MviqdvAnaqmRuta# iqha Ba#vati | nAnyaH panthA# vidyaqtE&ya#nAya || praqjApa#tiScaratiq garBE# aqntaH | aqjAya#mAnO bahuqdhA vijA#yatE | tasyaq dhIrAqH pari#jAnantiq yOni$M | marI#cInAM paqdami#cCanti vEqdhasa#H || yO dEqvEByaq Ata#pati | yO dEqvAnA$M puqrOhi#taH | pUrvOq yO dEqvEByO# jAqtaH | namO# ruqcAyaq brAhma#yE || ruca#M brAqhmaM jaqnaya#ntaH | dEqvA agrEq tada#bruvan | yastvaiqvaM brA$hmaqNO viqdyAt | tasya# dEqvA asaqn vaSE$ || hrISca#tE laqkShmIScaq patnyau$ | aqhOqrAqtrE pAqrSvE | nakSha#trANi rUqpaM | aqSvinauq vyAtta$M | iqShTaM ma#niShANa | aqmuM ma#niShANa | sarva#M maniShANa || Expansion of hiraNyagaqrBa H (Appearing in T.S.4.1.8.3) hiqraqNyaqgaqrBaH sama#varttaqtAgrE# BUqtasya# jAqtaH patiqrEka# AsIt | sa dA#dhAra pRuthiqvIM dyAmuqtEmAM kasmai# dEqvAya# haqviShA# vidhEma || yaH prA#NaqtO ni#miShaqtO ma#hiqtvaikaq idrAjAq jaga#tO baqBUva# | ya ISE# aqsya dviqpadaq-Scatu#ShpaqdaH kasmai# dEqvAya# haqviShA# vidhEma || ya A$tmaqdA ba#laqdA yasyaq viSva# upAqsa#tE praqSiShaqM ~Myasya# dEqvAH | yasya# CAqyAmRutaqM ~Myasya# mRuqtyuH kasmai# dEqvAya# haqviShA# vidhEma || ‘yasyEqmE hiqmava#ntO mahiqtvA yasya# samuqdra(gm) raqsayA# saqhA&&huH | yasyEqmAH praqdiSOq yasya# bAqhU kasmai# dEqvAya# haqviShA# vidhEma || yaM kranda#sIq ava#sA tastaBAqnE aqByaikShE#tAqM mana#sAq rEja#mAnE | yatrAdhiqsUraq udi#tauq vyEtiq kasmai# dEqvAya# haqviShA# vidhEma || yEnaq dyauruqgrA pRu#thiqvI ca# dRuqDhE yEnaq suva#s staBiqtaM ~MyEnaq nAka#: | yO aqntari#kShEq raja#sO viqmAnaqH kasmai# dEqvAya# haqviShA# vidhEma || ApO# haq yanma#haqtI viSvaqmAyaqn-dakShaqndadhA#nA jaqnaya#ntI-raqgniM | tatO# dEqvAnAq-nnira#varttaqtAsuqrEkaqH kasmai# dEqvAya# haqviShA# vidhEma || yaSciqdApO# mahiqnA paqryapa#Syaqd-dkShaqndadhA#nA jaqnaya#ntI-raqgniM | yO dEqvEShvadhi# dEqva yEkaq AsIqt kasmai# dEqvAya# haqviShA# vidhEma || aqdByaH saMBU#tO hiraNyagaqrBa ityaqShTau || EqSha hi dEqvaH praqdiSO&nuq sarvAqH pUrvO# hi jAqtaH sa uq garBE# aqntaH | sa viqjAya#mAnaH sajaniqShyamA#NaH praqtya~g-muKA$ stiShThati viqSvatO#muKaH || viqSvata#Sca-kShuruqta viqSvatO# muKO viqSvatO# hasta uqta viqSvata#spAt | saM bAqhuByAqM nama#tiq saM pata#traiqr-dyAvA# pRuthiqvI jaqnaya#n dEqva Eka#H || vEqnastat paSyaqn. viSvAq Buva#nAni viqdvAn. yatraq viSvaqM BavaqtyEka#-nILaM | yasmi#nniqda(gm) sa~jcaq vicaikaq(gm)q sa OtaqH prOta#Sca viqBuH praqjAsu# || pratadvO#cE aqmRutaqnnu viqdvAn ga#ndhaqrvO nAmaq nihi#taqM guhA#su | 3 (10)

trINi# paqdA nihi#tAq guhA#suq yastadvEda# saviqtuH piqtA&sa#t || sa nOq bandhu#r-janiqtA sa vi#dhAqtA dhAmA#niq vEdaq Buva#nAniq viSvA$ | yatra# dEqvA aqmRuta#mAna-SAqnAstRuqtIyEq dhAmA$nyaq-Byaira#yanta || pariq dyAvA#pRuthiqvI ya#nti saqdyaH pari# lOqkAn pariq diSaqH pariq suva#H | Ruqtasyaq tantu#M ~MvitataM ~MviqcRutyaq tada#paSyaqt tada#Bavat praqjAsu# || paqrItya# lOqkAn paqrItya# BUqtAni# paqrItyaq sarvA$H praqdiSOq diSa#Sca | praqjApa#tiH prathamaqjA RuqtasyAqtmanAq-&&tmAna#-maqBi-saMba#BUva || sada#saqspatiq-madBu#taM priqyamindra#syaq kAmya$M | sani#M mEqdhA ma#yAsiShaM || uddI$pyasva jAtavEdO &paqGnanniRu#r.tiqM mama# | 4 (10)

tannO# nandiH pracOqdayA$t || tatpuru#ShAya viqdmahE# mahAsEqnAya# dhImahi | tanna#H ShaNmuKaH pracOqdayA$t || tatpuru#ShAya viqdmahE# suvarNapaqkShAya# dhImahi | tannO# garuDaH pracOqdayA$t || vEqdAqtmaqnAya# viqdmahE# hiraNyagaqrBAya# dhImahi | tannO$ brahma pracOqdayA$t || nAqrAqyaqNAya# viqdmahE# vAsudEqvAya# dhImahi | tannO# viShNuH pracOqdayA$t || vaqjraqnaqKAya# viqdmahE# tIkShNa-daq(gg)qShTrAya# dhImahi | 6 (10)

tannO# nArasi(gm)haH pracOqdayA$t || BAqskaqrAya# viqdmahE# mahaddyutikaqrAya# dhImahi | tannO# AdityaH pracOqdayA$t || vaiqSvAqnaqrAya# viqdmahE# lAlIqlAya# dhImahi | tannO# agniH pracOqdayA$t || kAqtyAqyaqnAya# viqdmahE# kanyakuqmAri# dhImahi | tannO# durgiH pracOqdayA$t || saqhaqsraqpara#mA dEqvIq SaqtamU#lA SaqtA~gku#rA | sarva(gm)# haratu# mE pAqpaqM dUqrvA du#Hsvapnaq nASa#nI || kANDA$t kANDAt praqrOha#ntIq paru#ShaH paruShaqH pari# | 7 (10)

EqvA nO# dUrvEq prata#nu saqhasrE#Na SaqtEna# ca || yA SaqtEna# prataqnOShi# saqhasrE#Na viqrOha#si | tasyA$stE dEvIShTakE viqdhEma# haqviShA# vaqyaM || aSva#krAqntE ra#thakrAqntEq viqShNukrA$ntE vaqsundha#rA | SirasA# dhAra#yiShyAqmiq raqkShaqsva mA$M padEq padE || BUmir-dhEnur dharaNI lO#kadhAqriNI | uqdhRutA#&si va#rAhEqNaq kRuqShNEqna Sa#ta bAqhunA || mRuqttikE# hana# mE pAqpaqM ~MyaqnmaqyA du#ShkRutaqM kRutaM | mRuqttikE$ brahma#dattAq&siq kAqSyapE#nABiqmantri#tA | mRuqttikE# dEhi# mE puqShTiqM tvaqyi sa#rvaM praqtiShThi#taM || 8 (10)

mRuqttikE$ pratiShThi#tE saqrvaqM taqnmE ni#rNudaq mRutti#kE | tayA# haqtEna# pApEqnaq gaqcCAqmi pa#ramAqM gatiM || yata# indraq BayA#mahEq tatO# nOq aBa#yaM kRudhi | maGa#van Caqgdhi tavaq tanna# UqtayEq vidviShOq vimRudhO# jahi || svaqstiqdA viqSaspati#r-vRutraqhA vimRudhO# vaqSI | vRuShEndra#H puqra E#tu naH svastiqdA a#Baya~gkaqraH || svaqsti naq indrO# vRuqddhaSra#vAH svaqsti na#H pUqShA viqSvavE#dAH | svaqsti naqstArkShyOq ari#ShTanEmiH svaqsti nOq bRuhaqspati#r dadhAtu || ApA$nta-manyustRuqpala#praBarmAq dhuniqH SimI#vAq~j-Caru#mA(gm) RujIqShI | sOmOq viSvA$nyataqsA vanA#niq nArvAgindra#M pratiqmAnA#ni dEBuH || 9 (10)

brahma# jaj~jAqnaM pra#thaqmaM puqrastAqd-visI#maqtaH suqrucO# vEqna A#vaH | sa buqdhniyA# upaqmA a#sya viqShThAH saqtaScaq yOniq-masa#taScaq viva#H || syOqnA pRu#thiviq BavA# nRukShaqrA niqvESa#nI | yacCA# naqH Sarma# saqprathA$H || gaqndhaqdvAqrAM du#rAdhaqr.ShAqM niqtyapu#ShTAM karIqShiNI$M | IqSvarI(gm)# sarva#BUtAqnAqM tAmiqhOpa#hvayEq SriyaM || SrI$rmE Baqjatu | alakShmI$rmE naqSyatu | viShNu#muKAq vai dEqvAH CandO#-BiriqmAn ~MlOqkA-na#napajaqyya-maqBya#jayann | maqhA(gm) indrOq vajra#bAhuH ShODaqSI Sarma# yacCatu || 10 (10)

svaqsti nO# maqGavA# karOtuq hantu# pAqpmAnaqM ~MyO$&smAn dvEShTi# || sOqmAnaq(gg)q svara#NaM kRuNuqhi bra#hmaNaspatE | kaqkShIva#ntaqM ~Mya au#SiqjaM | SarI#raM ~Myaj~jaSamaqlaM kusI#daqM tasmi$n thsIdatuq yO$&smAn dvEShTi# || cara#NaM paqvitraqM ~Mvita#taM purAqNaM ~MyEna# pUqta-stara#ti duShkRuqtAni# | tEna# paqvitrE#Na SuqddhEna# pUqtA ati# pAqpmAnaq-marA#tiM tarEma || saqjOShA# indraq saga#NO maqrudBiqH sOma#M piba vRutraha~jCUra viqdvAn | jaqhi SatrUq(gm)q rapaq mRudhO# nudaqsvAthABa#yaM kRuNuhi viqSvatO# naH || suqmiqtrA naq Apaq OSha#dhayaH santu durmiqtrAstasmai# BUyAsuqr yA$&smAn dvEShTiq ya~jca# vaqyaM dviqShmaH || ApOq hiShThA ma#yOq BuvaqstA na# UqrjE da#dhAtana | 11 (10)

maqhEraNA#yaq cakSha#sE | yO va#H Siqvata#mOq rasaq-stasya# BAjayatEq ha na#H | uqSaqtI-ri#va mAqtara#H | tasmAq ara#~ggamAmavOq yasyaq kShayA#yaq jinva#tha | ApO# jaqnaya#thA ca naH || hira#NyaSRu~ggaqM ~Mvaru#NaqM prapa#dyE tIqrthaM mE# dEhiq yAci#taH | yaqnmayA# Buqkta-maqsAdhU#nAM pAqpEBya#Sca praqtigra#haH || yanmEq mana#sA vAqcAq kaqrmaqNA vA du#ShkRutaqM kRutaM | tannaq indrOq varu#NOq bRuhaqspati#H saviqtA ca# punantuq puna#H punaH || namOq&gnayE$-&PsuqmatEq namaq indrA#yaq namOq varu#NAyaq namO vAruNyai# namOq&dByaH || 12 (10)
